name: Rob & Bobberts
description:
Welcome and thanks for looking at Rob & Bobberts!

This is my first ever published game, so it might not be perfect, if you have thoughs on the project, share them and mybe I will implement it! The same goes for bugs, as I trust I accidentally left plenty!

The game might not be much, but if you have a few minutes to spare, it is fun to get a new highscore, the game is not super challenging, but that doesn't mean it is a cakewalk.

If you have a good score, good job! Share your score in the comments and maybe you can see how you compare to others! Or not, who knows, I just hope you have a little bit of fun. 

-Fantorim the Golden

If you want to quite the game press ESC, if you want to play after you pressed ESC, just reload the page.

Current game build: 1.2
